author: powercode
body:
I have a PR that displays help description in tooltips for commands and command parameters.

![cmdhelp](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3505151/36815472-119f57d4-1cdb-11e8-9653-b6bc8aa5ced3.gif)

This issue is for discussion it is a good idea, if it needs tweaking or just isn't the right thing.

Personally, I think it can help with discoverability.

comments.author: rkeithhill
comments.body: Looks pretty sweet to me!  👍 from me.

comments.author: thezim
comments.body: What happens if near the end of the terminal window? Does it auto scroll to show the tooltip or pop below?

comments.author: powercode
comments.body: The layout is handled by PSReadline. The only thing I have done is provided more text in the tooltip.

comments.author: YenForYang
comments.body: Ah I wish this worked. It really would help users, particularly the newer ones (like myself).

title: Add help to command completion tooltips
